publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2765 Mr Brian Monteith: Intelligent Finance Jobs Boost for Fifeâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the announcement from internet and telephone bank Intelligent Finance that it is to create 600 new jobs and transfer a further 200 to a new customer contact and administration centre located in Rosyth, Fife. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-2765 Intelligent Finance Jobs Boost for Fife (lodged on 21 February 2002) Andrew Wilson*, John Scott*
S1M-2765 Intelligent Finance Jobs Boost for Fife (lodged on 21 February 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*, Murdo Fraser*
